person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Peters left a meeting between NZ First and National negotiators to spend 20 minutes speaking to Labour leader Helen Clark .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
|--------|
| Peters  |
| Helen Clark |
| NZ First |
| National negotiators |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Peters |
| Helen Clark |
| NZ First (as a political party, can be considered a collective entity, but for the purpose of this exercise, we can assume it refers to the individuals within the party involved in the meeting) |
| National negotiators (same as above) |

location.content:

| --- |
| a meeting between NZ First and National negotiators |
| Peters left this meeting |
| Peters spoke to Helen Clark |
| Labour leader Helen Clark's location (implicit) |

| --- |

| Labour leader Helen Clark's location |
